name: episomal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an episome (= a piece of separate genetic material inside a cell that can copy itself): The study looked at episomal replication of cloned DNA. The DNA remained episomal and was not integrated into the genome. Related word
episome
More examplesFewer examplesThe virus remains episomal and is lost during cell division.There was a rapid decline in the amount of episomal DNA per cell.The episomal material can be lost during the procedure.The gene can be isolated with an episomal vector.This genome is thought to exist in an episomal form in human cells.
